name: animemusic-scraper
description: Scrap specific things from MyAnimeList.net, modified version of MalScraper (https://github.com/Kylart/MalScraper) by Kylart.

scripts.clear: break>output.txt && @echo off && cls && echo Cleared output.txt
scripts.patch: npm version patch -m "Bump version to %s" && git push --follow-tags
scripts.minor: npm version minor -m "Bump version to %s" && git push --follow-tags
scripts.major: npm version major -m "Bump version to %s" && git push --follow-tags

author: Soitora
